subject: Good day!!!!
body:
Good day!!!!
How are you doing today together with your families/friends hope they
are doing great in the Lord. Am really sorry you did not hear from me
again since last year, because I receive an urgent call from my state
Governor to come and contest for state Local Government Chairman which
is my right because I told him last time that I lost my job as a Lt
General.
Furthermore, I thank almighty God the election take place and I won as
a Local Government Chairman in my state, am contacting you to let you
know that God has answered your prayers by making me a state Local
Government Chairman and we are a state of CRUDE OIL which our yearly
budget is larger than other 36 states in Nigeria. Today been
8/11/2023 Federal Republic of Nigeria has approved our 2023 Local
Government Pension budget, which am sending this letter to you to
include your name among Pensioners list under my State Local
Government and you will be receiving $500,000 every month from this
month for FOUR (4) years of my tenure.
PLEASE FILL THE INFORMATION BELOW:
Your Full Name:
Home Address:
Telephone:
Finally, Immediately I hear from you I will forward the next step you
will follow to make sure the process is complete and you will start
enjoying your monthly pension from this month. Please get back to me
now for more explanation on how we will get this monthly Pension deal
done.
I will be waiting for your reply as soon as possible.
Thanks
Yours faithfully,
David Olu (S.L.G.C)
State Local Government Chairman (S.L.G.C)

subject: Re:   Good day!!!!
body:
Hello David Olu,

I hope this message finds you well. It's great to hear about your recent success in becoming the State Local Government Chairman. That must be a very prestigious position! I'm also glad to hear that your state is doing well economically, thanks to the crude oil.

Your offer of including me on the pensioners list is quite intriguing. However, I have a few questions before we proceed further. Could you please explain how this process works? And why have you chosen me for this opportunity?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Eugene

subject: Re: Good day!!!!
body:
Attn: Eugene
I appreciate your congratulatory message. Indeed the position I occupied is
a very prestigious one.
It was contested by so many contestant but I emerge as the winner. I will
be in this position  for a period
of 4 years which is a single tenure.
I choose you with a fate of destiny believing you will use your good
position to secure this deal.Actually, this is going to be a deal between
both of us. What I am going to do is to use my position to include your
name as one of the diaspora pensioners who work with my local government
over the past years. We have a foreign reserve where funds are deposited to
offset such diaspora payments. When I include your name I will obtain an
approval that will enable the foreign bank to credit your account with the
due pension settlement. The process is simple and sure. If you have more
questions, feel free to ask before we swing into action
Yours faithfully,
David Olu (S.L.G.C)
State Local Government Chairman (S.L.G.C)

subject: Re: Good day!!!!
body:
Attn: Eugene
I have been expecting your response since I sent you my second response on
Friday the 9th of February2024.
Do your best to response so that I can formalize all the legal processes
that will qualify you as one of the beneficiaries to receive the foreign
pension allocation. Please respond urgently and you are reading this
message.
Yours faithfully,
David Olu (S.L.G.C)
State Local Government Chairman (S.L.G.C)

subject: Re: Good day!!!!
body:
Hello David Olu,

Thank you for your message. I'm quite intrigued by this foreign pension you mentioned. Could you please provide more details about it? How does one qualify to receive it? And what are the legal processes involved?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Eugene

subject: Re: Good day!!!!
body:
Dear Eugene,
You have nothing to worry about. The process is very straight and
legitimate.
The first process will be for me to incorporate your personal details into
the pension plan database.as one of the qualified
beneficiaries to receive the monthly pension allocation fund. When that is
done, an online bank account with be open for you in our offshore bank
coordinate through which the pension fund will be credited to you.
Yours faithfully,
David Olu (S.L.G.C)
State Local Government Chairman (S.L.G.C

subject: Re: Good day!!!!
body:
Hello David Olu,

Thank you for your message. It's great to hear about this pension plan. I'm curious, could you explain a bit more about how the process works? And what kind of details would be needed to get started?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Eugene

subject: Re: Good day!!!!
body:
Dear Eugene
This is a very impressive deal. It will yield us 500,000 dollars  monthly
for the period of 4 years my tenure will last. We will share it 50-40-10
ratio.  You will be entitled to 50% while 40% will be for me and the 10%
will be for any expenses we incurred. I would like to invest my own 40% in
your country while you oversee the investment. This deal must be kept
confidential between both of us. The details I need from you are your full
names and address, copy of ID, phone number. I shall use the details when
received to incorporate you and the rightful pensioneer to receive from our
overseas paying bank.
Yours faithfully,
David Olu (S.L.G.C)
State Local Government Chairman (S.L.G.C

subject: Re: Good day!!!!
body:
Hello David Olu,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this interesting opportunity. It sounds like a potentially beneficial arrangement, but I would love to understand more about it.

Could you please provide more details about the investment? What kind of business are we talking about here? And how exactly will the profits be generated?

I'm also curious about the expenses that might be incurred. Could you give me an idea of what these might include?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Eugene

subject: Re: Good day!!!!
body:
Dear Eugene
I am pleased with your curiosity to know about every detail before
venturing into the transaction proper. This shows that you are a very
articulated person and I am glad to have come in contact with you. As
regards to the investment, I will leave it to you to decide since it is in
your country that it will be established. However, if you do not have any
knowledge of profitable investment in your country, I may suggest you open
a bank account for me where my own share will be deposited. I don't mind
sending my wife over so that you will assist her to open the bank account
so that after my tenure, I can come over to take full responsibility of my
own share.
As per the expenses, it is nothing to worry about possibly. the offshore
bank might require an account activation fee from you when they open the
online account for you.

If you have more questions feel free to ask before we swing into action.
Yours faithfully,
David Olu (S.L.G.C)
State Local Government Chairman (S.L.G.C

subject: Re: Good day!!!!
body:
Hello David Olu,

I'm delighted to hear from you and appreciate your trust in me. Your proposal sounds interesting, but I must admit, I'm not very familiar with these types of transactions. Could you please explain a bit more about how this process works? 

Also, you mentioned an offshore bank account. How does that work exactly? And what kind of activation fee are we talking about?

Lastly, you mentioned sending your wife over to assist with the bank account opening. That's quite a commitment! Can you tell me more about why this is necessary?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Eugene

subject: Re: Good day!!!!
body:
Dear Eugene
We do not have much time to be going with this question and answer section.
All I want is your details as I requested so that I can incorporate you as
one of the beneficiary. By the time we start the process, you will
understand it more better. Tell more a little about yourself. What do you
do for a living? How old are you? What is your marital status?
Yours faithfully,
David Olu (S.L.G.C)
State Local Government Chairman (S.L.G.C

subject: Re: Good day!!!!
body:
Dear David Olu,

Thank you for your message. I appreciate your interest in getting to know me better. I'm a simple person who enjoys the little things in life. As for my job, I work in a field that brings me joy and satisfaction.

However, as much as I'd love to share more about myself, I believe it's important to maintain some level of privacy online. So, let's keep our conversation focused on the topic at hand.

Could you please provide more information about the process you mentioned? It would be great if you could explain it in detail so that I can understand it better.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Eugene

subject: Re: Good day!!!!
body:
The process is simple.
When you send your details, I shall through my connection incorporate it
into the pension scheme database.
After that the internal revenue board will approve it so that monthly
payment of 500.000 dollars will be granted for you.
Then, an online bank account will be opened for you through which the fund
will be credited to you.

I hope this explains all the processes in a nutshell. Are you going to
provide your details now or not?
Yours faithfully,
David Olu (S.L.G.C)
State Local Government Chairman (S.L.G.C

subject: Re: Good day!!!!
body:
Hello David Olu,

Thank you for explaining the process to me. It sounds very interesting! I'm just a bit curious about a few things, if you don't mind me asking.

Firstly, how does this pension scheme work exactly? And why is it necessary for the internal revenue board to approve it?

Secondly, could you tell me more about this online bank account? How will I be able to access it and manage my funds?

I appreciate your patience with all my questions. Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Eugene

subject: Re: Good day!!!!
body:
You should not worry about the approval and the rest of the job how it is
going to be done. Yours is to provide details and the whole process will be
legalized while you receive monthly payment. The bank will give you online
access information of the account which you will use to access the funds.

subject: Re: Good day!!!!
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. It sounds like an interesting opportunity. I'm curious, how does the online access to the bank account work? And what kind of details would I need to provide? Also, could you please explain a bit more about the monthly payment process?

Best wishes,
Eugene

subject: Re: Good day!!!!
body: Good bye

subject: Re: Good day!!!!
body:
Hello there! It seems like you're in a hurry. Is there anything you'd like to share or discuss before you go?

Best wishes,
Eugene

subject: Re: Good day!!!!
body: I need a serious business minded person not a story teller

subject: Re: Good day!!!!
body:
Hello there! I'm really interested in what you're saying. Could you please elaborate more on the type of business-minded person you're looking for? What kind of qualities should they possess?

Best wishes,
Eugene
